description: This is a Dart source file containing multiple Flutter widget classes for screens in a TV interface app, including details, search, watchlist, and settings screens, with custom focus and accessibility controls.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: Displays detailed information about a media item with focusable action buttons.

classes.name: _DetailsButtons
classes.description: Private widget with focusable 'Play' and 'Add to Watchlist' buttons for DetailsScreen.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: Implements a focusable search interface with recent searches and results list.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStub
classes.description: Focusable stub for the search input field, for focus control in SearchScreen.

classes.name: WatchlistScreen
classes.description: Displays a focusable list of saved watchlist items with remove buttons.

classes.name: _WatchlistRow
classes.description: Private row widget for each watchlist item, with focusable remove button.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of focusable settings options.

classes.name: _SettingsTile
classes.description: Private widget for a focusable settings list item with icon, title, subtitle.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each screen class based on current state and focus.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes focus nodes and other resources for focusable components.

methods.name: _runSearch
methods.description: Executes a search query and updates the search results list.

methods.name: onActivate
methods.description: Callback invoked when a focusable item is activated.
